name: Sync Companies from Google Sheets to Salesforce with Smart Duplicate Prevention
description:
## How it works
Automatically imports company data from Google Sheets into Salesforce while intelligently preventing duplicate accounts. The workflow searches for existing companies, creates new accounts only when needed, and ensures all contact information is properly associated.

Key features:
- Smart duplicate detection by company name matching
- Dual processing paths for new vs existing companies  
- Automatic contact creation and association
- Comprehensive error handling and data validation
- Professional sectional documentation with setup guides

## Set up steps
- Configure Google Sheets API credentials (OAuth 2.0)
- Set up Salesforce Connected App with Account/Contact permissions
- Prepare Google Sheets with proper column headers (Company Name, Email, Phone, Industry)
- Map Salesforce field requirements in workflow nodes
- Test with small dataset before full deployment

**Estimated setup time:** 15-30 minutes  
**Processing time:** 15-45 seconds per company

All detailed configuration steps, troubleshooting guides, and security best practices are included in the comprehensive sticky note documentation within the workflow.

workflow.name: Salesforce-Google Sheets Company Sync (Smart Duplicate Prevention)

parameters.query: =SELECT id, Name FROM Account WHERE Name = '{{$json["Company Name"].replace(/'/g, '\\\'')}}'

nodes.name: Set Account ID for existing accounts

parameters.content:
# 📊 Part 1: Data Input & Preparation

## Extract company data from Google Sheets and prepare for Salesforce processing.

### Modules:
- Manual Trigger - Starts the workflow execution
- Get row(s) in sheet - Reads company data from Google Sheets  
- Search Salesforce accounts - Checks for existing companies
- Merge existing account data - Combines sheet data with SF search results

# 🔄 Part 2: Smart Routing & Duplicate Detection

## Analyze search results and route companies to appropriate processing paths.

### Logic Flow:
Companies are automatically sorted into two paths based on whether they already exist in Salesforce, preventing duplicates while ensuring complete 
data capture.

# 🆕 Part 3: New Company Processing

## Create new Salesforce accounts for companies not found in the system.

### Modules:
- Keep new companies - Filters companies not in Salesforce
- Remove duplicate companies - Eliminates internal duplicates  
- Create Salesforce account - Creates new SF account records
- Set new account name - Configures account naming
- Retrieve new company contacts - Gets contact data for new accounts

# ✅ Part 4: Existing Company Processing

## Handle companies that already exist in Salesforce by updating contact information.

### Modules:
- Account found? - Identifies companies already in Salesforce
- Set Account ID for existing accounts - Maps existing account IDs
- Create Salesforce contact - Adds/updates contacts under existing accounts

# 🎯 Salesforce-Google Sheets Company Sync (Smart Duplicate Prevention)
## Made by: Xavier Tai

## This workflow automatically syncs company data from Google Sheets to Salesforce with intelligent duplicate prevention and comprehensive contact management.

### ✅ What You'll Need
☑️ Google Sheets with company data (Company Name, Email, Phone, Industry, etc.)
☑️ Google Sheets API credentials (OAuth 2.0 authentication configured in n8n)
☑️ Salesforce API access (Connected App with Account/Contact create/read permissions)
☑️ Salesforce field mapping knowledge (understanding of required vs optional fields for Accounts/Contacts)
☑️ n8n instance (cloud or self-hosted with HTTPS)

### ⏱️ Estimated execution time: 15-45 seconds per company

### 🔧 Security Best Practices
- Use environment variables for API keys and tokens - never hardcode credentials
- Limit workflow access to necessary team members only via n8n user permissions  
- Test with small datasets (5-10 companies) before full deployment
- Process in batches of 25-50 companies maximum to respect API limits
- Backup existing Salesforce data before running bulk operations

### 🚨 Troubleshooting Guide
- "Authentication failed" → Refresh OAuth credentials in n8n connections
- "Required field missing" → Check Salesforce Account/Contact required fields  
- "Duplicate account created" → Verify company name exact matching in search logic
- "Rate limit exceeded" → Reduce batch size or add delay nodes between API calls
- "Sheet not found" → Verify Google Sheets file sharing permissions and sheet name

### 🚀 Execute workflow
Click the red "Execute workflow" button below to start processing your company data.
Monitor progress in the execution panel and verify results in Salesforce.

main.node: Set Account ID for existing accounts

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
